729327f-b.text:
(1)
Richmond Avenue, west side, at the head of Church Street, showing the Dutch Reformed Church. It stands on the site of the church that burned down during the Revolution.
About 1910
By Mulford Simonson
From P.L. Sperr Collection

(2)  and (3)
Viewing from Church Street. Views 2 and 3 were taken
the same day.
1924
P.L. Sperr
729327f-b.folder: Richmond Avenue & Church Street, Staten Island, NY
